title: Why was the Breonna Taylor case reopened? - Quora

response.answer_text: What Floyd case did was open a can worms.. her case is being reviewed because her case have a lot of questions with no answer.. Her case probably will not be the last.. probably all of the 4 officers cases will be reviewed by either State or Federal agency’s.. also probably the prosecutors office will be investivegsted too.. so I my opinion is some people will be fired.. and some inmates will have a new trial
